WRITING.TITLE: Lynel hunting
WRITING.TEXT:
So I've seen a few ways of fighting lynels on here but I sorta made my own way and I find it to be the easiest way for myself and just wanted to share it. . I start with paragliding close to then, using my best bow I fire as many arrows as I can before safely landing close to them. I mount and attack with my 101 attack savage lynel crusher, after getting bucked off I fire arrows at his face so I can mount him again. And just repeat until he's dead. I also have the barbarian set upgraded twice. Although I only use the charge attack if I know I have enough time. Usually beat them this way without taking much damage.
What are your tips and tricks for killing lynels?
Nah, I went in there looking for trouble. Killed one lynel and a few minor guys and just climbed my way until I found it.
